scripts.deploy:cr: docker build -f Dockerfile.backend -t us-central1-docker.pkg.dev/simply-trade-4fbbd/qualimed-repo/qualimed-backend . && docker push us-central1-docker.pkg.dev/simply-trade-4fbbd/qualimed-repo/qualimed-backend && gcloud run deploy qualimed-backend --image us-central1-docker.pkg.dev/simply-trade-4fbbd/qualimed-repo/qualimed-backend --platform managed --region us-central1 --allow-unauthenticated
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy:cr && npm run deploy:h
